title: BANNED. I hate the league community.
body: So many unskilled kids. And toxicity. I have anger issues and i know how to play. But i get banned. I spent so much time and money on this game and they need to see other players. The causes and effects. I have no words.

replies.body:
You were banned for something.

If you've done something bad enough to actually get banned, then you're a part of the problem.

If you didn't do anything wrong, send a ticket to support, and get your account unbanned.

> [{quoted}](name=D1V1NE DARKNESS,realm=NA,application-id=T8eq2lFQ,discussion-id=6uy4NFi3,comment-id=,timestamp=2017-09-29T23:14:57.193+0000)
>
> I have no words.

But you do, it was those words that got you banned.{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
Wait i thought it was a team game????
I believe Riot don't usually ban for a first offence, it's usually a chat ban or suspension for a first offence which makes me wonder how many other times you have been warned.
